planet.name: HAT-P-13 c
TYC 3416-00543-1 c
2MASS J08393180+4721073 c
planet.description: The star HAT-P-13 is located in the constalltion Ursa Major and hosts at least two extrasolar planets. Only the inner planet is transiting. There might be an unconfirmed third planet in the system.
The star HAT-P-13 is located in the constalltion Ursa Major and hosts at least two extrasolar planets. Only the inner planet is transiting. There might be an unconfirmed third planet in the system.
